snippet.title: Swift Grouped Messages: UITableView Section Date Headers (Ep 3)
snippet.description:
In today's lesson, let's improve the look and feel of our application by providing some sections and headers. We'll be restructuring our messages to provide our table with the appropriate data. Finally, we can create a custom Date function that helps us create custom dates for our messages. Enjoy.
